And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

About this Blog

And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free. John 8:32.

சத்தியத்தையும் அறிவீர்கள், சத்தியம் உங்களை விடுதலையாக்கும் என்றார். யோவான் 8:32.

Based on this scripture, I want to know more about the Truth. Everytime i know something new, by reading Bible, or by listening sermon, or by any means, i just post here.

About me

I am A believer, who believes in GOD and His only begotten Son the Christ and the Holy Sprit.
